reg_info.act_under: Health Cards and Numbers Control Act, 1991

content.content: 1. The following persons are prescribed for the purposes of subsection 2 (3) of the Act: 1. A person who manufactures health cards under a contract with the Province of Ontario. 2. The Canadian Institute for Health Information. 3. The Workers’ Compensation Board. 4. The Institute for Clinical Evaluative Sciences. 5. A medical officer of health under the Health Protection and Promotion Act. 6. A person working on behalf of the project called HIV Ontario Observational Database. 7. Cancer Care Ontario. O. Reg. 337/91, s. 1; O. Reg. 413/92, s. 1; O. Reg. 40/93, s. 1; O. Reg. 585/94, s. 1; O. Reg. 83/95, s. 1; O. Reg. 431/97, s. 1. Français
content.raw_html:
1. The following persons are prescribed for the purposes of subsection 2 (3) of the Act:

1. A person who manufactures health cards under a contract with the Province of Ontario.

2. The Canadian Institute for Health Information.

3. The Workers’ Compensation Board.

4. The Institute for Clinical Evaluative Sciences.

5. A medical officer of health under the Health Protection and Promotion Act.

6. A person working on behalf of the project called HIV Ontario Observational Database.

7. Cancer Care Ontario. O. Reg. 337/91, s. 1; O. Reg. 413/92, s. 1; O. Reg. 40/93, s. 1; O. Reg. 585/94, s. 1; O. Reg. 83/95, s. 1; O. Reg. 431/97, s. 1.

Français
